**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 132 2.0 **Usage** held in 1 hand **Bulk** 1 --- A _guardian staff_ is formed from ivory strands woven in a diamond pattern and capped with a glowing ruby. Those charged with protecting others value this staff's spells. **Activate** ([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=561)) **Effect** You raise the staff and choose an ally within 10 feet. A ruby-colored plane of force appears like a shield near the ally, granting them a +1 circumstance bonus to AC until the start of your next turn. If you use this action again, any creature you previously granted this bonus to loses it. **Activate** Cast a Spell; **Effect** You expend a number of charges from the staff to cast a spell from its list. **Craft Requirements** Supply one casting of all listed levels of all listed spells. Guardian Staff **Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 132 2.0 **Price** 250 gp **Bulk** 1 ---
  • **Cantrip** [_forbidding ward_](/Spells.aspx?ID=126)
  • **1st** [_sanctuary_](/Spells.aspx?ID=266), [_spirit link_](/Spells.aspx?ID=302)
  • **2nd** [_share life_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1669), _spirit link_
Guardian Staff (Greater) **Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 132 2.0 **Price** 900 gp **Bulk** 1 ---
  • **3rd** [_life connection_](/Spells.aspx?ID=939), _spirit link_
  • **4th** _spirit link_, [_unfettered movement_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1732)
Guardian Staff (Major) **Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 132 2.0 **Price** 4,000 gp **Bulk** 1 ---
  • **5th** [_blessing of defiance_](/Spells.aspx?ID=871), _spirit link_, [_spiritual guardian_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1688)
  • **6th** [_repulsion_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1650), [_scintillating safeguard_](/Spells.aspx?ID=2023), _spirit link_, _unfettered movement_
name: Guardian Staff (Greater)
